page.title: 01Rushall Mill & Fields
page.content: The fields and the mill featured in the block are part of the estate surrounding the village of Rushall. Soil structure is medium loam over and in cultivation these fields are farmed organically i.e. no chemicals at all. At the mill, wheat is ground into flour and sold all over Great Britain. Bread, baked on the premises, is sold locally. The road passing through the block is A342 to Andover from Devizes. The public footpath crosses the road and is one of a network of local rights of way.
